org.openhab.binding.lcn

Class LCNBindingProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.model.item.binding.AbstractGenericBindingProvider
      • org.openhab.binding.lcn.LCNBindingProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openhab.core.binding.BindingProvider, org.openhab.model.item.binding.BindingConfigReader

    public class LCNBindingProvider
extends org.openhab.model.item.binding.AbstractGenericBindingProvider
implements org.openhab.core.binding.BindingProvider
    This class handles item binding definitions. Whenever explicit bindings change, this class will update them for the LCNBinding.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek

      • getUninitialized

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUninitialized()
        Returns a list of item names for items that have not been initialized yet. Initialized means, that there has been a request about data to the bus.
        Returns:
        A list of Strings, which can be empty.

      • getUninitializedModules

        public java.util.List<LCNInputModule> getUninitializedModules(java.util.List<java.lang.String> uninitialized)
        Returns a list of LCNInputModules which haven't been initialized yet. Initialized means, that there has been a request about data to the bus.
        Parameters:
        uninitialized - A list of item names from which the Modules are to be extracted.
        Returns:
        A list of LCNInputModules, which can be empty. There are no duplicates (not even similar Modules) in the list.

      • getItemNamesByModule

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getItemNamesByModule(LCNInputModule mod,
                                                    int homeSegment)

        Parameters:
        mod - The LCNInputModule to serach by.
        Returns:
        A list of Strings, which can be empty.
